wiki.content:
A power cover of Robert Johnson's "Me and the Devil Blues," in which Gil Scott-Heron's age and drugs-ravaged voice gives a raw power and intensity to the lyrics, and his difficult times of late produces layers of meaning and grief.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: A power cover of Robert Johnson's "Me and the Devil Blues," in which Gil Scott-Heron's age and drugs-ravaged voice gives a raw power and intensity to the lyrics, and his difficult times of late produces layers of meaning and grief.

track.name: Me and the Devil
comments: this is truly the Blues kids...  aint nothin but PAIN
addicted to this at the moment.
Chills me to the bones.  Like Johnny Cash, he went out with his boots on.
The Blues are strong with this one.
Gil Scott-Heron and Jamie xx - 'We're New Here' rated at 61% - Check out the track by track review: http://www.embrulhador.com/2011/03/gil-scott-heron-and-jamie-xx-were-new.html
best video ive ever seen! great song!  YES

best video ive ever seen!
great song!
